EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Security Workshop_DC_Q217.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-Native Security Workshop Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud-Native Security Workshop, hosted by Pivotal.
Date: Thursday, June 29, 2017
Time:
9:00AM to 3:00PM
Location: Pivotal DC 1625 I St. NW | Suite 601 Washington, DC, 20006 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1625+I+St+NW+%23601,+Washington,+DC+20006/@38.9017197,-77.0397048,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89b7b7be98e02e3d:0x108c36fd70d86b11!8m2!3d38.9017197!4d-77.0375161]]>)
Be sure to read all about cloud-native security and how to reduce risk in the enterprise here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security]]>. Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Cloud-Native-Security-Workshop-DC.html]]>
